HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.cartTransferError: Something went wrong when we tried to transfer your cart

fulfillmentStatus.not_fulfilled_description: The default status when an order is placed, indicating that the items in the order haven't been fulfilled yet.
fulfillmentStatus.partially_fulfilled_description: Some items in the order have been fulfilled, but not all.
fulfillmentStatus.fulfilled_description: All items in the order have been fulfilled.
fulfillmentStatus.partially_shipped_description: Some items in the order have been shipped, but not all.
fulfillmentStatus.shipped_description: All items in the order have been shipped.
fulfillmentStatus.partially_delivered_description: Some items in the order have been marked as delivered or picked-up, but not all.
fulfillmentStatus.delivered_description: All items in the order have been marked as delivered or picked-up.
fulfillmentStatus.partially_returned_description: Some items in the order have been returned, but not all.
fulfillmentStatus.returned_description: All items in the order have been returned.
fulfillmentStatus.canceled_description: All order fulfillments have been canceled.

paymentStatus.authorized_description: The default status when an order is placed, unless the payment provider is configured to automatically capture the payment.
paymentStatus.partially_authorized_description: Part of the payment is authorized, which happens if an order has changed. For example, if an order was edited and new payment is required.
paymentStatus.captured_description: The payment has been captured and processed with the payment provider.
paymentStatus.partially_captured_description: A part of the payment has been captured. This happens when an order's payment was previously captured, but a change to the status, such as an exchange, requires additional payment.
paymentStatus.refunded_description: The payment has been refunded to the customer.
paymentStatus.partially_refunded_description: A part of the payment has been refunded.
